'''Corey Clemans''' is a former community coordinator for Latin America for ''[[Mojang Studios|Minecraft]]''. On July 16, 2018, he announced his departure from the company.<ref>{{tweet|CoreyClemans|1018887566299299840|Hello, my friends. The time is quickly approaching for when I must say goodbye to you all. I have decided to take an opportunity outside of the videogame industry. I have greatly enjoyed getting to know each of you and I’m sure we’ll see each other in Minecraft. All the best!|July 16, 2018}}</ref>

== About ==
Corey's job consisted of assisting with community management for the ''Minecraft'' franchise and specializing in community management for Latin American communities.

== Trivia ==
* Corey worked with [[Helen Zbihlyj]] previously when they were both on the [[wikipedia:Xbox Game Studios|Xbox Game Studios]] Community Team.
* Corey livestreams in Spanish, Portuguese and English.
* His favorite color is green.{{citation needed}}
